blogPost.excerpt: Create charts with https://styled-components.com/. A react lib built with TS and almost no dependencies (no d3 and all this stuff). Import some default chart components as Bar, Path, BarGroup, restyle them and add back to the chart 😁-> profit.
blogPost.body: Create charts with https://styled-components.com/. A react lib built with TS and almost no dependencies (no d3 and all this stuff). Import some default chart components as Bar, Path, BarGroup, restyle them and add back to the chart 😁-> profit.
blogPost.title: Styled chart - Create beautiful charts with styled-components
blogPost.author: Vova Tereschenko

localize.description: 用https://styled-components.com/ 创建图表。一个用TS构建的反应库，几乎没有依赖性（没有d3这些东西）。导入一些默认的图表组件为Bar、Path、BarGroup，重新设计样式并添加回图表😁->利润。
用https://styled-components.com/ 創建圖表。一個用TS構建的反應庫，幾乎沒有依賴性（沒有d3這些東西）。導入一些默認的圖表組件爲Bar、Path、BarGroup，重新設計樣式並添加回圖表😁->利潤。

previous.excerpt: Shub helps businesses & professionals showcase their products & services while cross posting news to other social media channels. Post up/down vote troll limiting newsfeed & topics newsfeed. Add news images video gallery contact resume hashtags
previous.title: Shub.one - Networking platform to connect the business community

localize.description: Shub帮助企业和专业人士展示他们的产品和服务，同时将新闻交叉发布到其他社交媒体渠道。发布向上/向下投票的巨魔限制新闻源和主题新闻源。添加新闻图片视频图库联系人简历标签。
Shub幫助企業和專業人士展示他們的產品和服務，同時將新聞交叉發佈到其他社交媒體渠道。發佈向上/向下投票的巨魔限制新聞源和主題新聞源。添加新聞圖片視頻圖庫聯繫人簡歷標籤。

next.excerpt: Spark friendly competition with your team and boost morale, from Slack! People take turns drawing and guessing prompts. The faster you guess, the more points you get. Great for before a meeting, a Thursday social, or just taking a break. Up to 12 people.
next.title: Doodle - Pictionary, for Slack.

localize.description: 与你的团队激发友好竞争，提高士气，来自 Slack! 大家轮流抽签，猜测提示。你猜得越快，得到的分数就越多。非常适合在会议前、周四社交、或只是休息时使用。最多可容纳12人。
與你的團隊激發友好競爭，提高士氣，來自 Slack! 大家輪流抽籤，猜測提示。你猜得越快，得到的分數就越多。非常適合在會議前、週四社交、或只是休息時使用。最多可容納12人。
